website_summaries.verdict: Priced at $100, the Nike Kobe Mamba Instinct is hard to beat. You’ll get a comfortable, lightweight, and stylish set of kicks that have decent cushioning and great traction. However, getting a pair that fits well is crucial to enjoying its features. Or else, you may experience a lot of pain and discomfort and later regret buying these basketball sneakers.
pros: These sneakers look nice and go well with jeans and shorts, some note
Several reviewers just love the Nike Kobe Mamba Instinct, commenting that it is a well-built basketball shoe
The traction performs great on both clean and dusty courts, most testers point out
A good number of players appreciate the Lunarlon midsole, saying it provides a decent amount of impact protection and court feel
These Kobe basketball shoes feel secure and supportive for a low top, a small number notice
A few are amazed at how light and comfortable the Mamba Instinct feels on foot
Players report of having a similar experience when playing in Paul George’s third sneaker
cons: Like the CP3 XI, nearly all testers notice that the traction is soft and pliable
They do not advise using these Kobe shoes outdoors
The Nike Kobe Mamba Instinct is just too tight and uncomfortable to wear, several buyers complain
A few are disappointed that these Kobe Bryant basketball shoes are not made to accommodate wide and flat feet
Some wearers claim that the drop-in midsole is too big and the sides dig into their feet, causing pain and blisters

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking tennis shoes but.......
customer_reviews.text: They loook nice, lengthwise shoes fit ok but strangely the upper front part of the foot fits way too tight. Making it painful to walk. Thought about removing the extra thick insoles and get new ones but would be not worth it. Specially after paying more than $120 for these shoes. I’ve returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Mrcsir

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is terribly designed ... The length of the shoe is perfect, but in the middle it is so thin that it practically cut off blood circulation. I thought perhaps it was my foot, had two friends try it and they had the same issue. What a shame!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Insoles Are Very Thick
customer_reviews.text: The insoles of this shoe is very thick. You can take them out to replace them. My husband wears a size 12 with a medium to slim width. I'm not sure who can fit this shoe with the orginal insole. Nice looking shoe though.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa  Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe but really are purple. Fit is somewhat tight
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. Reason for 3 stars: description says blue and in pictures looked basically blue but in person they are purple. Also they fit kind of tight. Especially in the toe region and can’t loosen them in front portion of laces based on design.
customer_reviews.author: Ian E. Barr

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Wrong size sent two times. We’ve purchased before and my husband absolutely loves these shoes. Super comfortable for a guy with foot problems
customer_reviews.author: Steddy

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the shoe. The insole feels like hard plastic and I have terrible blisters on the back of my heels. The shoe gets a sharp bend to it near the toes which causes my feet to go numb during a basketball game.
customer_reviews.author: UPDude

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. They where a gift for my father and where everything I was expecting
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Matos

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Great Performing Basketball Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes. Very light and great grip. I really like the insoles with raised ribs and a built up edge on the outside edge. Definitely go 1/2 larger than you normally wear in sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley V

customer_reviews.title: Half size bigger to order perfect shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great design, great cushion, only thing that not fitting good is that shoes are narrow
customer_reviews.author: Observator

customer_reviews.title: I love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes. I just got them too small. They don’t fit like my other ones. I have a new bank account now & if I return it. I have to use the card of the account I closed.😢 All I want is to get a bigger size.😞
customer_reviews.author: DaRico Whetstone

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes for the price . Definitely not for wide feet . Should of ordered half size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He thinks they are comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my teen son. He thinks they are comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow.... I buy my daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow.... I buy my daughter men's size court shoes because she has wide feet. These were way too narrow. They were snug on me and my feet are on the narrow side for women.
customer_reviews.author: CWagner

customer_reviews.title: Great price for quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoe looks great. Good traction. No need to break it in. It's good right out of box
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Plus the insole is a bit rigid and not that comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: While this shoe looks gray online, it came in and was practically all black. Plus the insole is a bit rigid and not that comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: These Grew on me
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite sneakers to hoop in - All time
customer_reviews.author: Keith Caines

customer_reviews.title: The sole of the shoe is great and unique to this line
customer_reviews.text: The sole of the shoe is great and unique to this line. The shoe fits tigt on feet that are a little wider
customer_reviews.author: RedLadyBug

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Like a few reviews mention it's a little tight in the middle of the shoe so go a half size up. Otherwise good quality
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and supportive
customer_reviews.text: Rigid in sole, but comfortable and snug once worn a few times. Great to run in, as they’re fairly springy and light.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The gym shoes was nice, but was just to tight.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Sticking with Kobe shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My son plays BBall and needed a new pair of shoes I initially bought him kyrie 5 but my son said they did not have good grip. So I bought the Kobe’s he is happy with them. I did go a 1/2 size up because of reviews. We are sticking to Kobe shoes because they don’t disappoint like other shoes. You can find these shoes cheaper on other sites but I decided to pay a little more and buy on here because the amazon exchange policy is A1 no issues tho love the look of the shoes very light weight and worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Gall

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: The shoes smell. They smell like wet paint or like cheap material. It reminded me of the old Reebok’s in the 90s. They are very narrow at the ankle and the swoosh digs into your foot. They are also very flat and no cushioning so they fit large. I wore theses to work I’m a graphic designer and architect and I just walk to and from my office. By the end of the day some of the (scales) side tred on the shoes wore off. Also it’s very strange the insoles have no logo or anything. It’s a very cheaply made shoe it and shows. Looks nice but has no functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Russell J. Bean

customer_reviews.title: Takes a bit to break in like most shoes but after that they're very comfortable and ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes a bit to break in like most shoes but after that they're very comfortable and look great. Very good traction both indoor and outdoor, would definitely recommend especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Daniels

customer_reviews.title: If you like your feet DON'T buy these
customer_reviews.text: Listen to all the reviews. These shoes are not made right. Extremely tight on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Travis H

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: i like these shoes. but I'm getting wicked blisters despite wearing two pairs of socks. I'm not sure if it is the shoe, the socks, or just me.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Fitzgibbons

product_meta.title: Nike Mens Mamba Instinct (Black/White, 8)
feature_bullets: Basketball sneakers designed for Kobe Bryant’s game style
Flyweave upper is tightly woven into a single layer to reduce bulk
Anatomically-informed TPU yarns woven into forefoot for stability
Low-top design allows for free range of motion at the ankle
Internal, half stretch-mesh bootie construction wraps the foot
